text: avarkaḷil oru kūṭṭattiṉar (matīṉāvācikaḷai nōkki) ‘‘yasrip vācikaḷē! (Etirikaḷ muṉ) uṅkaḷāl niṟka muṭiyātu. Ātalāl, nīṅkaḷ tirumpic ceṉṟu viṭuṅkaḷ'' eṉṟu kūṟiyataiyum, avarkaḷil maṟṟoru piriviṉar avarkaḷuṭaiya vīṭukaḷ apāyakaramāṉa nilaimaiyil illāmaliruntum ‘‘niccayamāka eṅkaḷ vīṭukaḷ apāyakaramāṉa nilaimaiyil irukkiṉṟaṉa'' eṉṟu kūṟi (yutta kaḷattiliruntu ceṉṟuviṭa nam) napiyiṭam aṉumati kōriyataiyum niṉaittup pāruṅkaḷ. Ivarkaḷ (yuttattiliruntu) tappi ōṭiviṭuvatait tavira (vēṟoṉṟaiyum) virumpavillai
